name: we're home.
description:
we’re home. is a bite-sized 2D psychological horror game focused on exploration and atmosphere. A seemingly normal day at home begins to take a peculiar change. Unnerving sounds and strange figures, you’ll explore what used to be (or still is) your home as the line between reality and your consciousness slowly blurs. Or is it all real? Or a simulation? Hmm, must have forgot something...

*Experiment with the mechanics and systems, and you may just end up in places you've never been to before!*

CONTROLS

  • [A]  / [←] - Move Left
  • [D]  / [→] - Move Right
  • [W] / [ ↑ ]  - Enter Back
  • [S]  / [ ↓ ]  - Enter Front
  • [J] / [Z] - Interact
  • Hold [K] / [X] - Examine
  • [Esc] - Escape

CREDITS

  • Nam (Xerialbole): 
    • Lead Game Director / Programming / Level and Sound Design
  • Angela (aykim): 
    • Art and Character Design
  • Clarissa (bluxyr): 
    • Level and Sound Design

All visual assets in the game are made and intended for the game. sounds are original and made by the development team.
